title: Setting Up
description: Welcome to the first chapter of The Legend of Python! Python is a beginner-friendly language created in the early 90s.
lessonExample:
# This is a simple Python function
print("Hi")

This should appear in the Terminal window:
Hi
hints: Remember to check the hints if you get stuck.
For this exercise, just copy the example!

title: Hello World
description: Your first real Python program. Use the print() function to show text on screen.
hints: Make sure your text is inside quotes.

title: Pattern
description: Let's create simple ASCII shapes by printing stars on multiple lines.

title: Initials
description: Use ASCII art to print your initials using multiple lines.
lessonExample:
print("""
JJJJJ
  J

J J

""")
